statements: SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Carbon Tax';
SELECT country, implementation_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE carbon_target > 50.00;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country = 'United States';
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT country, carbon_target FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Renewable Energy Mandate' AND carbon_target < 30.00;
SELECT policy_id, country, policy_name, policy_type, implementation_date, carbon_target FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT country, policy_name, policy_type, implementation_date, carbon_target, policy_id FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, country, policy_name, policy_type, ROUND(carbon_target * 100, 2) AS carbon_target_percentage FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Emission Reduction';
SELECT policy_id, country, policy_name, policy_type, implementation_date, carbon_target FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE carbon_target > 500 ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;

SELECT policy_id, country, policy_name, policy_type, implementation_date, carbon_target FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE policy_type IN ('Emission Reduction', 'Renewable Energy') ORDER BY country, policy_type, implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM climate_change_policies_table WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) FROM climate_change_policies_table GROUP BY policy_type
SELECT country, policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_change_policies_table ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT country, regulator, effective_date FROM climate_regulations_table WHERE regulation_type = 'Carbon Tax'
SELECT * FROM climate_change_policies_table WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM climate_change_policies_table WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM climate_change_policies_table ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT country, policy_name, end_date FROM climate_change_policies_table WHERE policy_type = 'Carbon Tax' AND country IN ('Germany', 'Canada')
SELECT * FROM climate_regulations_table WHERE regulator LIKE '%Environment%'
SELECT country, regulation_name, effective_date FROM climate_regulations_table WHERE regulation_type = 'Emission Standards'
SELECT id, country, policy_name, implementation_date, policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT country, policy_name, implementation_date, policy_description, id FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT country, policy_name, policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE implementation_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT country, policy_name, implementation_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM ClimateChangeReports GROUP BY country;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangeRegulations WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT country, policy_name, start_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE end_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, headquarters_location FROM PolicyOrganizations ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT id, change_date, change_description FROM PolicyChanges WHERE policy_id=1 AND change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE country='Canada';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyOrganizations ORDER BY organization_name DESC;
SELECT po.organization_name, po.headquarters_location, pc.change_date FROM PolicyOrganizations po JOIN PolicyChanges pc ON po.id = pc.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM ClimateChangePolicies;
SELECT policy_name, region FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, implementation_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM PolicyCategories WHERE policy_id=3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, region, implementation_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM ClimateChangePolicies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%renewable%'
SELECT policy_name, jurisdiction FROM ClimateChangePolicies JOIN RegulatoryBodies ON ClimateChangePolicies.region = RegulatoryBodies.jurisdiction
SELECT category_name, policy_name FROM PolicyCategories JOIN ClimateChangePolicies ON PolicyCategories.policy_id = ClimateChangePolicies.policy_id

SELECT policy_name, compliance_date FROM ClimateChangePolicies JOIN ComplianceRecords ON ClimateChangePolicies.policy_id = ComplianceRecords.policy_id WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
